info.title: Operations
info.description: The Operations API contains all the Video Indexer APIs, such as Upload video, Get insights, and other operations

parameters.name: location
parameters.description:
Location indicates the Azure region to which the call should be routed
See more details here

parameters.name: accessToken
parameters.description:
Access token should match the authorization scope of the call (User Read)
Note that Access tokens expire within 1 hour
See more details here

parameters.name: generateAccessTokens
parameters.description: Whether to generate an access token for each account.

parameters.name: allowEdit
parameters.description: Whether the tokens have write permissions

parameters.name: location
parameters.description:
Location indicates the Azure region to which the call should be routed
See more details here

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description:
Account ID is a globally unique identifier (GUID) for the account
See more details here

parameters.description:
Access token should match the authorization scope of the call (Account Read)
Note that Access tokens expire within 1 hour

See more details here

parameters.name: accountId

See more details here

parameters.name: videoId
parameters.description: The video id

parameters.name: accessToken
parameters.description:
Required for private videos
Access token should match the authorization scope of the call (Account or Video, with Read)
Note that Access tokens expire within 1 hour
See more details here

parameters.name: language
parameters.description:
The language of the captions. 
Supported languages: Afrikaans: Af-ZA, Arabic: ar-EG, Bangla: Bn-BD, Bosnian: Bs-Latn, Bulgarian: Bg-BG, Catalan: Ca-ES, Chinese (Simplified): zh-Hans, Chinese (Traditional): Zh-Hant, Croatian: Hr-HR, Czech: Cs-CZ, Danish: Da-DK, Dutch: Nl-NL, English: en-US, Estonian: Et-EE, Fijian: En-FJ, Filipino: fil-PH, Finnish: Fi-FI, French: fr-FR, German: de-DE, Greek: El-GR, Haitian: Fr-HT, Hebrew: He-IL, Hindi: Hi-IN, Hungarian: Hu-HU, Indonesian: Id-ID, Italian: it-IT, Japanese: ja-JP, Kiswahili: Sw-KE, Korean: Ko-KR, Latvian: Lv-LV, Lithuanian: Lt-LT, Malagasy: Mg-MG, Malay: Ms-MY, Maltese: Mt-MT, Norwegian: Nb-NO, Persian: Fa-IR, Polish: Pl-PL, Portuguese: pt-BR, Romanian: Ro-RO, Russian: ru-RU, Samoan: En-WS, Serbian (Cyrillic): Sr-Cyrl-RS, Serbian (Latin): Sr-Latn-RS, Slovak: Sk-SK, Slovenian: Sl-SI, Spanish: es-ES, Swedish: Sv-SE, Tamil: Ta-IN, Thai: Th-TH, Tongan: To-TO, Turkish: Tr-TR, Ukrainian: Uk-UA, Urdu: Ur-PK, Vietnamese: Vi-VN.

post.description:
Uploads the given video, starts indexing it and returns a new Video id.
The supported formats are listed here

parameters.name: location
parameters.description:
Location indicates the Azure region to which the call should be routed
See more details here

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description:
Account ID is a globally unique identifier (GUID) for the account
See more details here

parameters.name: accessToken
parameters.description:
Access token should match the authorization scope of the call (Account or Video with Write)
Note that Access tokens expire within 1 hour
See more details here

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The video name

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The video description.

parameters.name: partition
parameters.description: A partition to partition videos by (used for searching a specific partition)

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: An external id to associate with the video (can be searched for later).

parameters.name: callbackUrl
parameters.description:
A url to notify when indexing is completed.
It should be a POST url and VideoIndexer will add 2 additional query string parameters to it: id and state.

For example, if the callback url is 'https://test.com/notifyme?projectName=MyProject', the notification will be sent with additional parameters to 'https://test.com/notifyme?projectName=MyProject&id=1234abcd&state=Processed'.

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description: Metadata to associate with the video (will be returned in queries).

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language of the video, to be used when generating the transcript. Arabic: ar-EG, Chinese (Simplified): zh-Hans, English: en-US, French: fr-FR, German: de-DE, Italian: it-IT, Japanese: ja-JP, Portuguese: pt-BR, Russian: ru-RU, Spanish: es-ES, or auto for auto-detection.

parameters.name: videoUrl
parameters.description: A public url of the video/audio file (url encoded). If not specified, the file should be passed as a multipart/form body content.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: The uploaded file name.

parameters.name: indexingPreset
parameters.description: The indexing preset to use (Default/AudioOnly/DefaultWithNoiseReduction).

parameters.name: streamingPreset
parameters.description: The streaming preset to use (Default/SingleBitrate/AdaptiveBitrate/NoStreaming).

parameters.name: linguisticModelId
parameters.description: Linguistic model id as received by 'create linguistic model' call

parameters.name: privacy
parameters.description: The video privacy (Private or Public)

parameters.name: externalUrl
parameters.description: An external URL to associate with the video (can be retrieved later)

get.description: Search videos in the specified account

parameters.name: location
parameters.description:
Location indicates the Azure region to which the call should be routed
See more details here

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description:
Account ID is a globally unique identifier (GUID) for the account
See more details here

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Free text to search for.

parameters.name: textScope
parameters.description: The text scope to search in.

parameters.name: privacy
parameters.description: A privacy level (Private, Organization, Public).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A breakdown id to search for.

parameters.name: partition
parameters.description: A partition to search for.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: An owner to search for.

parameters.name: face
parameters.description: A face to search for.

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: An external id to search for (which was associated with the video at upload).

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of results to return.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of results to skip (used for paging).

parameters.name: sourceLanguage
parameters.description:
Include only videos with that source language. You can specify multiple language parameters (e.g. $language=English&language=French) to search multiple languages. Having no language parameter will search all languages.
Supported languages: Afrikaans: Af-ZA, Arabic: ar-EG, Bangla: Bn-BD, Bosnian: Bs-Latn, Bulgarian: Bg-BG, Catalan: Ca-ES, Chinese (Simplified): zh-Hans, Chinese (Traditional): Zh-Hant, Croatian: Hr-HR, Czech: Cs-CZ, Danish: Da-DK, Dutch: Nl-NL, English: en-US, Estonian: Et-EE, Fijian: En-FJ, Filipino: fil-PH, Finnish: Fi-FI, French: fr-FR, German: de-DE, Greek: El-GR, Haitian: Fr-HT, Hebrew: He-IL, Hindi: Hi-IN, Hungarian: Hu-HU, Indonesian: Id-ID, Italian: it-IT, Japanese: ja-JP, Kiswahili: Sw-KE, Korean: Ko-KR, Latvian: Lv-LV, Lithuanian: Lt-LT, Malagasy: Mg-MG, Malay: Ms-MY, Maltese: Mt-MT, Norwegian: Nb-NO, Persian: Fa-IR, Polish: Pl-PL, Portuguese: pt-BR, Romanian: Ro-RO, Russian: ru-RU, Samoan: En-WS, Serbian (Cyrillic): Sr-Cyrl-RS, Serbian (Latin): Sr-Latn-RS, Slovak: Sk-SK, Slovenian: Sl-SI, Spanish: es-ES, Swedish: Sv-SE, Tamil: Ta-IN, Thai: Th-TH, Tongan: To-TO, Turkish: Tr-TR, Ukrainian: Uk-UA, Urdu: Ur-PK, Vietnamese: Vi-VN.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description:
The language to search in. You can specify multiple language parameters (e.g. $language=English&language=French) to search multiple languages. Having no language parameter will search all languages.
Supported languages: Afrikaans: Af-ZA, Arabic: ar-EG, Bangla: Bn-BD, Bosnian: Bs-Latn, Bulgarian: Bg-BG, Catalan: Ca-ES, Chinese (Simplified): zh-Hans, Chinese (Traditional): Zh-Hant, Croatian: Hr-HR, Czech: Cs-CZ, Danish: Da-DK, Dutch: Nl-NL, English: en-US, Estonian: Et-EE, Fijian: En-FJ, Filipino: fil-PH, Finnish: Fi-FI, French: fr-FR, German: de-DE, Greek: El-GR, Haitian: Fr-HT, Hebrew: He-IL, Hindi: Hi-IN, Hungarian: Hu-HU, Indonesian: Id-ID, Italian: it-IT, Japanese: ja-JP, Kiswahili: Sw-KE, Korean: Ko-KR, Latvian: Lv-LV, Lithuanian: Lt-LT, Malagasy: Mg-MG, Malay: Ms-MY, Maltese: Mt-MT, Norwegian: Nb-NO, Persian: Fa-IR, Polish: Pl-PL, Portuguese: pt-BR, Romanian: Ro-RO, Russian: ru-RU, Samoan: En-WS, Serbian (Cyrillic): Sr-Cyrl-RS, Serbian (Latin): Sr-Latn-RS, Slovak: Sk-SK, Slovenian: Sl-SI, Spanish: es-ES, Swedish: Sv-SE, Tamil: Ta-IN, Thai: Th-TH, Tongan: To-TO, Turkish: Tr-TR, Ukrainian: Uk-UA, Urdu: Ur-PK, Vietnamese: Vi-VN.

parameters.name: accessToken
parameters.description:
Required for private videos or account scope search
Access token should match the authorization scope of the call - A video token (for a single video search) or account token with read permissions
Note that Access tokens expire within 1 hour
See more details here

parameters.name: accessToken
parameters.description:
Access token should match the authorization scope of the call (Account or Video, with Write)
Note that Access tokens expire within 1 hour
See more details here

parameters.name: indexingPreset
parameters.description:
Indexing presets:
 NoiseReduction - Will run an additional step of noise reduction.
Audio Only - get insights from audio only.
Default - Use no preset (similar to not populating the parameter)

parameters.name: streamingPreset
parameters.description:
Streaming presets: 
Default - Single layer (similar to not sending the parameter)
AdaptiveBitrate - Multiple layers based on media's framerate 
SingleBitrate - Single layer

parameters.name: callbackUrl
parameters.description: The callback uri to call with the status once the operation completes

parameters.name: sourceLanguage
parameters.description: The language to set set as the source language of the video, to be used when generating the transcript. Arabic: ar-EG, Chinese (Simplified): zh-Hans, English: en-US, French: fr-FR, German: de-DE, Italian: it-IT, Japanese: ja-JP, Portuguese: pt-BR, Russian: ru-RU, Spanish: es-ES.

parameters.name: languageModelId
parameters.description: LanguageModelId as appears in the LanguageModel returned by Language customization APIs

parameters.description:

parameters.name: newName

put.description:
Updates the video with the given transcript.
If the specified language is the source language of the video, then the video will be re-indexed with the given transcript, and the transcript of all the other languages will be re-generated.
If the specified language is not the source language, the transcript of that language will be updated and the new text will be written into the existing lines and blocks of that language.

post.description:
Creates a language model.
There are two ways to upload files in the body using form-data.
1. Key will be the file name and value will be the file.
2. Key will be the file name and value will be a URL to txt file.
